title: Lido
description: In the Lido project, we crafted a harmonious brand identity aimed at urban dwellers seeking balance in a busy world. Our clean, minimalistic approach spanned from logo design to a fully developed website, creating a unified brand experience that resonated with the target audience. The end result is a visually cohesive and user-friendly digital presence that elevates the Lido Condo brand.
